thread.title: Police: Handyman arrested in couple's killing, cash missing
thread.title_full: Police: Handyman arrested in couple's killing, cash missing - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Police: Handyman arrested in couple's killing, cash missing
text:
NEW ORLEANS (AP) - Police say a handyman kidnapped and strangled a couple he worked for and stole tens of thousands of dollars from a safe in their home.
Police say Ernesto Llerena Alonso, of Baton Rouge, was arrested about 8 a.m. Wednesday in Hollywood, Florida, and will be extradited and booked with kidnapping and murder in the deaths of Denis Duplantier and Suzanne Duplantier.
The Duplantiers' bodies were found in their pickup at a truck stop in Hammond, about 45 miles east of Baton Rouge and 860 miles from Hollywood.
Police say surveillance video showed Alonso's white pickup pulling into the truck stop at the same time as the Duplantiers' red truck.
Police said Tuesday they were searching for a second, unidentified suspect, in the case.
